Reviews.Title: “Close in, Great Value”

Reviews.Content: read previous reviews mixed bag pleasantly surprised cleanliness mine recently remodeled location ideal close west seattle nightlife drive closein town construction west seattle freeway allow 60 minutes 15 commute times cost half shots downtown charging definitely stay bars check seattle

Reviews.Content: stayed grove definately skeptical told owners positive bed furnishing negatives endless understand owners money property obvious guided wrong directions workmanship obviously teenage kids job gotten contractor bathroom extreme help sink stopper toilet flush forever hot water time warm hair tub pee toilet bowl heater dont wish terminated sometimes heavy set guy late night business terrible guest services lady morning lacks confidence nice rate 79 expensive product service receive furnishing nice cheap motel

Reviews.Title: “Nice Place”
Reviews.Author: Yrs1674
Reviews.Content: friend stay west seattle option little reluctant booked walking distance birthday party huge stayed king suite itwas bigger bed apartments clean beds comfortable heat controlled controls baseboard heaters difficult control temperature window try cool struggled noise outside bathroom 2 comfortably kitchen living huge nice pullout couch flat panel tv coffee maker microwave kitchen staff checkin process quick inn plenty private parking overall recommend price location

Reviews.Title: “Nice enough for me”
Reviews.Author: sherry709
Reviews.Content: december visit daughter christmas nicer past love improvements heater warm infact perfect clean maid service refrigerator coffee maker wish microwave sleep coming 2 pleasantly surprised improvements

Reviews.Title: “Too slow to warm up”
Reviews.Author: OregonPhotoTraveler
Reviews.Content: weve gone visit daughter family couple times cold winter months im afraid revise rating november heater arriving 10pm 30 minutes noticeable change called front desk comment takes hour warm notice register getting warmer coats bed time woke double warm month try king time driving night oregon hour called heat register little warm king larger heat window wall coats bed warmed husband hes cold clean staff helpful rates reasonable youre winter try staying call ahead heat youre arriving late blankets couldnt heat minimal temperature rented decent hotel west seattle location airport downtown despite experiences hope theyll continue improvements

Reviews.Title: “We'd Go Again”
Reviews.Author: Libra1947
Reviews.Content: sister stayed grove west seattle inn found staff friendly clean quiet rent car bus stop outside front door west seattle main street shopping dining easy walking distance avid walkers enjoyed walking quaint neighborhoods hotel views fantastic definitely stay

Reviews.Title: “Seemed to have a little strange activity,but was a good stay.”

Reviews.Content: wife hear weekend haunted night phone rang hook 4 am morning phone rang twice ocasion woke wife bathroom looked called front desk phone tenant told unplug phone werent scared wife presence night apartments clean front desk workers helpful validate experience future occurred 132

Reviews.Title: “Decent room but noisey location”
Reviews.Author: MitchFindlay
Reviews.Content: lot choices stay west seattle chose grove reservation advance specifically wing alaska street instead checked 5 pm night 201 hte corner street arguably noisiest nicely appointed lack door sink toiletshower bit weird anyway bus noise loud lasted quieted 10 pm traffic resumed 7 am dont expect sleep upstairs corner bungalow breakfast nice offers fairly healthy choice cold foods decor appointments class drive furthur stay quiter honors request quiet
